              Liang Fu付亮
            
            
              
                
            
          
        
        
        
          
            Welcome to my personal website!
            I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Economics at International Business School Suzhou
            (IBSS), Xi’an Jiaotong-Liverpool University
            (XJTLU). My main research fields are Monetary
            Economics and International
            Economics.
            
            
            Curriculum Vitae
            Liang.Fu@xjtlu.edu.cn

              Welcome to my personal website!

articles.title: Research
articles.contents:

Real Exchange Rate and Innovation: Firm-Level Evidence from China (with Chun-Yu Ho and Xiaoli Zhang)
Pulications
Feng, Shu, Liang Fu, Chun-Yu Ho, and Wai-Yip Alex Ho. “Political Stability and Credibility of Currency Board.” Journal of International Money and Finance 137 (2023): 102911. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jimonfin.2023.102911
Fu, Liang and Chun-Yu Ho.”Monetary Policy Surprises and Interest Rates under China’s Evolving Monetary Policy Framework.” Emerging Markets Review 52 (2022): 100895. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ememar.2022.100895
